title: Will Forte | Bombshell Private Jan. 6 Texts from Don Jr and Fox News Hosts Revealed: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at a stunning turn in the investigation of Trump's attempted coup, revealing that his son, as well as several Fox News hosts, privately begged then-Chief of Staff Mark Meadows to get Trump to stop the Capitol attack.

Then, Will Forte talks about recovering after day drinking with Seth, proposing to Seth's sister-in-law and the rejected titles for his series MacGruber.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
